name: Vanny
bio: Vanny is Concept Artist/Illustrator & creative designer who is passionate about western comic books but his art style is heavily inspired and driven by manga-style art. He believes his art is Avantasia which is a never-ending revealing of untold stories.

name: Bolu Sowoolu
bio: Bolu is a multidisciplinary artist and creator.

name: Khadijah Ibrahim
bio: Khadijah works in advertising and helped write The J Guide.

name: Jubril Olambiwonnu
bio: Jubril is an IOS Engineer and helped write The J Guide.

name: Eseosa Belo-Osagie
bio: Eseosa is a digital illustrator and product designer at Check DC.

name: Wale Oloworekende
bio: Wale is a freelance writer and critic whose work explores the intersection of popular culture, music, film, sports, and lifestyle.

name: Jessica Louis
bio: Jessica is a visual story teller. She's an artist and illustrator who helped get Cover Bank to 5000 images.

name: Daniel Orubo
bio: Daniel is a writer, editor and director. He currently works as Head of Content at PiggyVest and Backdrop.

name: Ani Kayode
bio: Ani Kayode is an award-winning writer and liberation fighter marinated in anti-imperialist rage.

name: Edwin Okolo
bio: Edwin is a writer, editor and strategic thinker who also founded the boutique design label Studio Imo.

name: Timehin
bio: OluTimehin is a Nigerian storyteller working primarily in multi-format nonfiction and public advocacy.

name: Adeniyi Ademoroti
bio: Adeniyi is a writer and an editor at BellaNaija.com. His writing has been featured in Brittlepaper and Per Contra.

name: Olakunle Ologunro
bio: Olakunle Ologunro is a writer from Lagos, Nigeria. He is a finalist for the 2020 Adina Talve-Goodman Fellowship from One Story Magazine.

name: Innocent Ilo
bio: Innocent is a Nigerian writer based in Lagos. They are the regional winner for Africa of the 2020 Commonwealth Short Story Prize for their short story 'When a Woman Renounces Motherhood'.

name: Mariam Sule-Izuagbe
bio: Mariam's work centers on intersectional feminism, underrepresented minorities and interpersonal communication dynamics.

name: Alithnayn
bio: Alithnayn is a dog and a cat person. She gets paid to tackle big socioeconomic issues and write. She has been published by Harvard, Quartz, Wasafiri, Ozy and more. She won a short story day africa prize for outstanding fiction in 2021.

name: Ope Adedeji
bio: Ope is an experienced editor and has worked in online media and traditional publishing.

name: Kunle Popoola
bio: Kunle is a writer.

name: Osione Itegboje
bio: Osione is a multidisciplinary artist. He developed a technology called SLIDE to help businesses and personalities build stronger, bolder identities.

name: Niyi Okeowo
bio: Niyi is the Chief Design Officer at Garmspot and is currently building Astra, a network of cities in the metaverse for playing NFT games and buying digital fashion to wear IRL.

name: Saratu Dan-Habu
bio: Saratu is curious about emerging and disruptive technology and specializes in all aspects of intellectual property law and practice.

name: Hannatu Dan-Habu
bio: Hannatu runs Hawk & Dane, a technology and data advisory law firm.

name: Yadichinma Uloha-Kalu
bio: Yadichinma Ukoha-Kalu is an independent artist, illustrator and art director based in Lagos, Nigeria. Her practice centers on explorations of line, form and boundary which she expresses through a variety of media including painting, drawing, sculpture and digital media.

name: Samson Oyedija
bio: Samson is a Production Assistant at Kugali, where he is helping tell African stories. He is also interested in helping build legacy products.

name: Ivierawo Lesso
bio: Ivie is a self-taught illustrator and 2D animator.

name: Yanmo Omorogbe
bio: Yanmo is a friend of the studio and cofounder at Bamboo.

name: LMBSKN
bio: LMBSKN is a sound producer.

name: Remy Baggins
bio: Remy is a Nigerian singer, songwriter, producer and sound engineer.

name: Chukwudi Echezie Okoro
bio: Chukwudi Okoro Is a 2D/3D generalist with over 8 years of experience in the advertising and digital communication field and has worked on brands and organizations like Confederation of African Football (CAF), Access Bank, BBC, The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC), Raven, Malta Guinness, MADworld in collaboration with MotoGP, and more.

name: Joshua Adeoye
bio: Joshua is a freelance animator, book illustrator and artist, currently working on two comic series.

name: Kolade Morakinyo
bio: Kolade leads the sound department at Visus Sonic Arts.

name: Oshuwa Imoyo
bio: Oshuwa is an actress, most popularly known for The Wait (2021) and The Smart Money Woman (2020).

name: Ifebusola Shotunde
bio: Ifebusola is a photographer and graphic designer who focuses on documenting the people and places on his life's journey.

name: Jessica A.
bio: Jessica has worked as a Story & Script Editor, Head Writer and Content Director. She's a producer on Big Brother Naija and currently writes Africa Magic's Primetime TV series, Venge.

name: Tosin Amire
bio: Tosin is an audio post-production artist experienced in the entertainment industry.

name: Obika Ifunanya Linda
bio: Linda is a motion graphics designer.

name: Emmanuel Aminu
bio: Emmanuel is a freelance data analyst, who loves telling stories with data.
